dialogue.User: I’d like to get notified whenever the Department of Agriculture issues a new open recall.

dialogue.System: So you want to be notified about new open recalls from the Department of Agriculture. What specific recall are you interested in tracking?
dialogue.User: I’d like to track recalls related to “Frozen Strawberries - Potential Listeria Contamination”.

dialogue.System: Now that I'm tracking recalls for "Frozen Strawberries - Potential Listeria Contamination", how would you like to be notified?
dialogue.User:
Please send me an email with subject 'Recall Alert: Frozen Strawberries' and body '

Dear Recipient,

The Department of Agriculture has issued a recall for frozen strawberries due to potential Listeria contamination. Please see the attached link for more details and safety instructions.

Sincerely,
Department of Agriculture Recall Notification System

'.

Belief State.action_fields_values:
'Recall Alert: Frozen Strawberries', '

Dear Recipient,

The Department of Agriculture has issued a recall for frozen strawberries due to potential Listeria contamination. Please see the attached link for more details and safety instructions.

Sincerely,
Department of Agriculture Recall Notification System

'
Belief State.action_fields: Subject (Text input > Title), Body (Text input > HTML)

dialogue.User: I want to play music on my Android device when something happens with my Home Connect Cookit.

dialogue.System: Great! Now, what music would you like to play on your Android device when something happens with your Home Connect Cookit?
dialogue.User: I don't have a preference for music. You can play anything.

dialogue.System: So, when your Home Connect Cookit starts, what do you want to happen?
dialogue.User: I want my Android device to start playing music when the Cookit starts.

dialogue.System: Great! Which kitchen ID do you want to associate with this trigger?
dialogue.User: I would like to set the Kitchen ID to 'kitchen'.
I would like you to use Gmail as the action channel.

dialogue.System: Great! Now that we've chosen Gmail, what action would you like to perform with it?
dialogue.User: I want to send an email.

dialogue.System: Okay, you want to send an email. Could you please confirm the recipient, CC and BCC addresses, subject, body content, and attachment URL for this email?
dialogue.User:
The recipient is john.doe@example.com, there's no CC or BCC, the subject is 'Tomorrow\'s Weather in Los Angeles', the body is '

Hi John,

Just wanted to let you know the weather forecast for tomorrow in Los Angeles:

Expect sunny skies with a high of 75°F and a low of 60°F.

Have a great day!

', and the attachment URL is https://www.example.com/weather_report.pdf.

dialogue.User: I would like you to add any new item.

dialogue.System: Ok, you want me to monitor Pocket for any new items. Is that correct?
dialogue.User: Yes, that's correct. I want you to monitor Pocket.

dialogue.System: Great! Now that I'm monitoring Pocket, do you want me to define any specific criteria for the items you’d like me to look for?
dialogue.User: No, thank you. I don’t need any specific criteria at this time. Just monitor all new items in my Pocket account.

dialogue.System: Okay, so I'm monitoring your Pocket account for new items. If a new item is added, would you like me to post it as a tweet with an image on Twitter?
dialogue.User: Yes, please post any new item from my Pocket account as a tweet with its image on Twitter.

dialogue.System: Great! So I will post a tweet with an image when a new item is saved on your Pocket account. What text would you like to accompany the tweet and what's the URL of the photo?
dialogue.User: The tweet should say 'Just saved an interesting article on Pocket! Check it out ➡️ [link to article]' and the photo URL is https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1503023345310-bd7c9bc5eb99?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&ixid=M3wxMjA3fDB8MHxzZWFyY2h8Mnx8bGFuZHNjYXBlfGVufDB8fHx8MA%3D%3D.
